overview: Meet Herschel the cat, a big dreamer who couldn't be discouraged. Herschel was a cast away cat with a broken tail. Although he loved his adoptive family, Herschel's real dream was to be a ferocious jungle cat like the big lions and tigers. This video is colorfully illustrated by artist, Dianne Guthrie. Music is by Robert Guthrie, a well known classical guitarist and teacher. The story is based on actual events with animals from Herschel's real life.
title: Herschel The Cat
